blender_export module¶

Extracts lights FBX scene and converts them to XML format, readable by Mitsuba.

blender_export.blender_to_mitsuba_vec(v)¶

Converts a Blender vector to Mitsuba coordinate format.

Parameters:

v (mathutils.Vector) – Blender 3D vector.

Return str:

Mitsuba-formatted vector as a string.

blender_export.clear_scene()¶

Clears the Blender scene to default empty settings.

blender_export.get_lights()¶

Retrieves all light objects from the current Blender scene.

Return list:

List of Blender light objects.

blender_export.import_fbx(path)¶

Imports an FBX file into Blender.

Parameters:

path (str) – Path to the FBX file.

Raises:

FileNotFoundError – If the FBX file does not exist.

blender_export.main()¶

Main execution function.

blender_export.write_mitsuba_xml(xml_path, lights)¶

Writes light information into a Mitsuba XML file.

Parameters:

  • xml_path (str) – Path to save the XML file.

  • lights (list) – List of Blender light objects.

Raises:

IOError – If the XML file cannot be written.
